table.name: vtiger_coc
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_coc` ( `cocid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `coc_no` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `assesment_no` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fullname` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cocid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_coccf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_coccf` ( `cocid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cocid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
